name: International Affairs
description: 2019's most controversial and exciting release, International Affairs asks: "Do YOU have what it takes to seduce a world leader?!" With shocking plot twists, jaw-dropping dialogue, and five globetrotting hunks to choose from, the prospect of achieving world peace has never been so sensual.
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Microsoft Windows Vista / 7 / 8 Процессор: 1.5Ghz Processor or better Оперативная память: 1 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: Integrated Graphics Chip Место на диске: 975 MB
recommended_requirements: Рекомендованные: ОС: Microsoft Windows Vista / 7 / 8 Процессор: Pentium 4 or better Оперативная память: 2 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: Integrated Graphics Chip Место на диске: 1 GB
